name: Finland
startIntroPart1: Emil Mannerheim, you have earned the role of leader of Finland! Our country has thousands of lakes, a unique culture, and a people.
startIntroPart2: After gaining independence in the bloody year 18, we have earned full freedom of action. We are ready to take our place on the international stage!
declaringWar: You are a threat to our existence! Prepare for the worst!
attacked: Have you decided to pass through our lands? Are you sure about that?
defeated: We probably didn't deserve our sovereignty.
neutralLetsHearIt: We are ready to listen to your suggestion.
hateLetsHearIt: We are ready to listen to your suggestion.
uniqueName: The Land of a Thousand Lakes
uniques: [+1 Science] [in all cities] <in [Lakes] tiles> <starting from the [Industrial era]>
